name: Here Comes Godot
description:
I made this game for the Stop Waiting for Godot game jam (September 2021).

I wanted to combine the "keep it simple" theme and the "stop waiting for Godot" title of the jam, I ended up with a (simple) side-scrolling endless runner about Godot trying to reach whoever is waiting for him (?).

Use W/S keys or Up/Down arrow keys to move.

So, are you still here? Help Godot reach the goal (maybe), they're still waiting for him after all...

Created using Godot Engine. All the graphics assets and fonts come from the always useful Kenney free assets collection.
